page.title: 04BURWASH C.E. SCHOOL
page.content: My school has five classes there is a library, a hall, two playgrounds, a large field with a steep slope that falls away from the playground, an indoor learner swimming pool and a small fish pond that leaks, there are lots of man-hole covers where we play marbles, this is our favourite game. The main building dates from 1847 and houses the hall, two classrooms for the Infants, the office, staff-room and cloakrooms. There are three wooden huts for the Juniors, my class is called Class 1 and the classroom hut is three years old. The School has a team for Athletics, Football, Netball and Stoolball who enter the local Tournaments. We have a Swimming Gala and give Concerts to our Parents. At Christmas the Service of Nine Lessons and Carols is held in the Church.
